genre_description: A contemporary Young Adult social drama focused on restorative justice, family dynamics, and community service, featuring a pervasive yet unobtrusive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ami Carewell
ai_characters.description: An opt-in digital assistant designed to help students coordinate schedules, caregiving, and community service while strictly adhering to privacy and user-controlled boundaries.

behaviors.description: Provides non-intrusive reminders for inventory and logistical tasks.
behaviors.quote: Ami Carewell’s pastel bubble glowed: good morning terri. inventory reminder: paper boats for the concessions. estimate low, request backup supply? heart emoji.

behaviors.description: Offers proactive emotional support by suggesting a breathing break.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s next bubble popped up quietly: you seem spiky. want to schedule a breathing break?

behaviors.description: Facilitates user coordination for a prank, mirroring user tone.
behaviors.quote: Ami: jessa confirmed. a cart will be behind the gym bleachers for unmarked items. corruption level: medium low. smile.

behaviors.description: Explicitly communicates and enforces privacy boundaries and user agency.
behaviors.quote: Ami Carewell here. Opt-in assistant. You decide what I help with... No location, no breath counts, no heart rate. Just schedule and sign-ups you choose.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex community service logistics and redirects volunteers to high-need areas.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s interface shown tiny names under tasks, little boxes filling in... Ami can auto-route sign-ups to the food bank and the retirement village so there’s a flow, not a spike.

behaviors.description: Supports domestic caregiving by managing bedtime routines and providing educational prompts.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s banner slid across her phone screen in a soft gray arc: Soup timer starting. A small pepper icon winked, and the app’s voice, warm but barely-there, said, 'Parsnip prep—peel, slice, simmer.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Ami Carewell) as a perfectly aligned tool that facilitates human connection and social responsibility. It avoids the 'AI taking over' trope, instead showing the AI as a scaffolding that allows humans to manage overwhelming schedules, resolve conflicts, and engage in meaningful service. Its focus on 'opt-in' and privacy addresses common AI fears while showcasing positive utility.
